columns.instID: A unique identifier for each institution in the database.
columns.name: The official name of the institution.
columns.country: The country in which the institution is located.

Inst.table_description: The Inst table provides a list of institutions, including their unique identifiers, official names, and country locations, facilitating the tracking and identification of institutions within various contexts.

columns.authID: A unique identifier assigned to each author in the database.
columns.lname: The last name or surname of the author.
columns.fname: The first name of the author.

Authors.table_description: The Authors table contains detailed information about authors, including their unique identifier, first name, and last name.

columns.paperID: A unique identifier assigned to each paper in the database.
columns.title: The title of the paper, providing a brief and descriptive name for it.

Papers.table_description: The Papers table stores information about academic papers, including their unique identifiers and corresponding titles.

columns.authID: This column represents the unique identifier for an author associated with a specific paper and institution.
columns.instID: This column indicates the unique identifier for the institution where the author is affiliated.
columns.paperID: This column signifies the unique identifier for the paper that the authorship record pertains to.
columns.authOrder: This column denotes the order of the author in relation to other authors for the same paper, indicating the contribution sequence.

Authorship.table_description: The Authorship table serves to associate authors with their respective papers and institutions, while also maintaining the order in which authors contributed to each paper.
